channel.title: Netflix on Wimpy's World
channel.description: Recent content in Netflix on Wimpy's World

item.title: Netflix for ArchLinux
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description:
Something wonderful has happened! Jesus Alvarez has created pre-compiled packages for netflix-desktop for Arch Linux.

There is no need for me to repeat the installation instructions as they are clearly documented on the page below.

  • Arch Netflix - Netflix on the desktop through WINE

The source code for both of the packages can be found at archnetflix-github.

For reporting problems, please see the AUR page at netflix-desktop-aur or the announcement forum posting.
